name: La Statuette maudite de l'oncle Ernest
storyline:
The people of Chipikan live in a peaceful region where they were discovered by the adventurer Uncle Albert. With his knowledge he helped them develop a rocket if they ever needed to leave this area.
Now that the nearby vulcano is sure to erupt soon, the tribe attempts to use the rocket. However, they lack a cruical formula for the machine to work. Thus, Chipikan, a member of the tribe who has already helped finding other important relics of Uncle Albert is sent to retrieve this formula by finding Uncle Alberts old notebook.
summary: You and Chipikan embark again on an adventurous journey through Asia in order to find a secret formula that is needed to save Chipikans people. Together you will unveil the mysterious discoveries of the great adventurer Uncle Albert by solving many riddles and overcoming obstacles with courage, dexterity and logic thinking. You will do this by navigating through Uncle Alberts Notebook where every new page yields a new surprise.
